measurements.description: Approximately 2288 flowers in very fine condition and three buds on 12 highly branched inflorescences approximately 151cm long; exceptionally well-grown 137x103-cm plant in bark, 36 flat pseudobulbs 13.5x6cm, leathery leaves 47x9.2cm, 31-cm bulb pan; sepals and petals reflexed, coiled, light chartreuse barred light mahogany; lip white, ruffled side lobes, spotted light brown, claw white spotted light brown, callus yellow spotted light brown; column chartreuse, column wings white spotted light brown, anther cap chartreuse; substance soft; texture matte; all flowers in peak condition influenced the cultural award; see award #20215323 also.

corrections.reason: Updated to reflect actual source page URL structure (YYMMDD/awardNum.html)
